pages.text: $(sol)I can see it, the path forward diverges. My harnessing of the power of lightning shows great promise, but I cannot ignore the potential of pressurized gas. Not to mention my recent discovery of these mysterious flowers.$(br2)I am, for the first time in a while, stumped. Which of these many choices is the right one to make?
$(sol)I think all of them have potential, but which do I follow? Every moment I sit here just writing is another moment wasted, so I think I will review my notes, and then decide.
